revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=ClockworkPi |model=Core |revision=A-06 (RPi-CM3) |is_manuf=No |price=129 |est_release_date=09/2021 |type=SoM |pwr_v=3.3 |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3399 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4-1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=6 |fla1=0 |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H9HKNNNCTUMU-BRNMH |expansion_if_types=RPi-CM3 style SoDIMM connector |eth_none=true }} {{TagLine|ClockworkPi Core A-06}} :[https://www.clockworkpi.com/product-page/clockworkpi-core-a-06 Product page]
"clockwork", "CORE" and "A-06" are silkscreened on module top. :Pin compatible with [[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3 Lite]]
===Links=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/11/26/devterm-with-clockworkpi-v3-14-a-modular-portable-computer/ ''DevTerm with ClockworkPi v3.14: a modular, portable computer'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.hackster.io/news/clockwork-pi-devterm-review-hands-on-with-the-ultra-compact-trs-80-inspired-kit-computer-b5a73acbaefd ''Clockwork Pi DevTerm Review'' on '''hackster.io''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399 @1.8GHz :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) + :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.4GHz *GPU: ''Mali-T864'' (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG 1.1, OpenCL, DX11, AFBC) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Power Source: 3.3V via SoDIMM connector pins
===See also=== *[[ClockworkPi Core R-01]] *[[ClockworkPi DevTerm Kit R-01]] *[[ClockworkPi uConsole Kit R-01]] *[[ClockworkPi Core A-04]] *[[ClockworkPi DevTerm Kit A-04]] *[[ClockworkPi uConsole Kit A-04]] *[[ClockworkPi Core A-06]] *[[ClockworkPi DevTerm Kit A-06]] *[[ClockworkPi uConsole Kit A-06]]
==Images== <gallery> File:ClockworkPi Core A-06 Top.jpeg|SoM Top File:ClockworkPi Core A-06 Bottom.jpeg|SoM Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
